visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the title 'Australian City Populations'. The chart should display the population of six Australian cities, with each city represented by a different color. The axes and labels should be styled with specific colors and font sizes. The chart should also include a legend and have a white background with specific margins.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a column chart to display the population of six Australian cities. The chart is titled 'Australian City Populations' and is styled with a white background and specific margins for better visual clarity. The x-axis represents the cities, while the y-axis represents the population. Both axes are styled with specific colors and font sizes for their titles and labels. The data series includes the population figures for each city, with each city represented by a unique color. The chart also includes a legend to help identify each city's population bar. The colors for the bars are explicitly defined to ensure a consistent and visually appealing representation of the data.
